result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bradley E. Pitts

records.addlTxt: Due to a conflict in the courts calendar the STC of 10/17/22 at 1:30 has been adjourned with Attorney Foster to 11/10/22 at 2:00

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Attorney Thomas Binger appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person.  Clerk. M.Burke. DE appears an hour late. Court quashes the authorization of the warrant and does not forfeit bond. DE is ordered to go to SPD from court. STC set to 10/17/22 at 1:30.
Attorney Thomas Binger appeared for the State.  No appearance by the Defendant.  Clerk. M.Burke. Due to the non appearance of the DE court forfeits bond and issues a $5,000 bench warrant.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
Continued posted. 
  *Not to drive w/o VALID Driver's License.

03:28 PM   State appeared by Attorney Drew Lehman.  Defendant appeared in court in person.   Clerk JT  Minutes:  The Court finds probable cause in this case today.  Def. is referred to the Public Defender.  If not eligible, def. to retain his own counsel. Court date will not be adjourned due to def.'s failure to retain counsel.  Not guilty plea entered by court on behalf of DE. Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 22, 2022 at 01:40 pm.  Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 10:00 am. $1200.50  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry). rb
and witness list filed by the State
